quotes.quote: Greedy eaters dig their graves with their teeth.
quotes.author: French Proverb

quotes.quote: The chief weapon of sea pirates, however, was their capacity to astonish. Nobody else could believe, until it was too late, how heartless and greedy they were.
quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut

quotes.quote: Seek not happiness too greedily, and be not fearful of happiness.
quotes.author: Lao-tzu

quotes.quote:
There is no calamity greater than lavish desires.
There is no greater guilt than discontentment.
And there is no greater disaster than greed.
quotes.author: Lao-tzu
